lobbyPlayerInfo 

interface lobbyPlayerInfo

Summary

Properties from lobbyPlayerInfo

boolean
guest

Indicates whether the player is a guest account or not.
number
level

The player's level.
number
skinBg

Background colour of the player's skin.
number
skinColours

All colours used in the player's skin.
number
team

Indicates in what team the player is in.
string
userName

The player's username.

skinColours gmm.d.ts:927 
skinColours: number

number

All colours used in the player's skin.

team gmm.d.ts:912 
team: number

number

Indicates in what team the player is in.

0 means the player is in Spectate, 1 means the player is in FFA, 2 means Red Team, 3 means Blue Team, 4 means Green Team, and 5 means Yellow Team.

userName gmm.d.ts:900 
userName: string

string

The player's username.
